identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion of Digital Utility and Organic Fluidity

usage_rules: Body text should have relaxed line-height (leading-relaxed).
Use 'Outfit' for all main titles and large numbers.
Use 'Manrope' for list items, inputs, and small text.

glassmorphism.base: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/30 border border-white/50 shadow-lg shadow-blue-900/5

layout.container: max-w-5xl mx-auto px-6 py-12 relative z-10

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-600 text-white hover:bg-cyan-500 shadow-lg shadow-cyan-500/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.glass: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/20 border border-white/40 text-slate-700 hover:bg-white/40 rounded-full px-6 py-2 transition-all

cards.todo_item: group relative overflow-hidden backdrop-blur-md bg-white/40 border border-white/60 rounded-xl p-4 hover:bg-white/60 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-1
cards.dashboard_widget: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/30 border border-white/50 rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-sm

inputs.glass_input: bg-white/50 border-white/60 focus:bg-white/80 focus:border-cyan-400 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-slate-400

3d_scene.background_integration: Fixed position, z-index -1, covering full viewport

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install three @types/three @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
2. SETUP THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors and animations defined above.
3. CREATE 3D BACKGROUND: Build a 'BackgroundScene.js' component using R3F. It should be subtle and not distract from the content.
4. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a main layout wrapper that holds the 3D background and the main content container.
5. IMPLEMENT COMPONENTS: Build 'GlassCard', 'GlassButton', 'TodoItem' using the visual enhancers.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
7. NO MOCKING: Implement the actual logic for adding/removing todos using React state (Context API or Zustand recommended for state management).
8. LIQUID EFFECT: Use the 'MeshPhysicalMaterial' in R3F to achieve the liquid glass look for 3D objects.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with spacing and transparency.
Do not use solid white backgrounds for containers; always use semi-transparent whites with blur.
Ensure text contrast is sufficient on glass backgrounds (use slate-800 or darker for text).
Do not use 'Inter' for headings; use 'Outfit' or similar geometric sans.
